== Synaptic Features Supported in Ubuntu Software Center ==

This table presents a list of current Synaptic features and indicates whether each feature is supported in the current version of Ubuntu Software Center.

The versions of each application used in this comparison were:
* ''Synaptic'' -- <code>0.70</code>
* ''Software Center'' -- <code>4.0.2</code>
